title: Help. Can't Access League
body:
When I open League it gets stuck on the logo, I can't access https://support.riotgames.com/
 either.

replies.body:
I presume you can't download the installer either. **Do not uninstall your game.**

This issue has been affecting many people, and a common solution for them all was to [change their DNS to Google's Public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4). Not a permanent fix, but it works for them.

Best of luck.
Alright well it just randomly started working again but if I ever have the issue again I'll keep this in mind, thank you.
oh, well Riot did just change some of their config files in their servers. That was probably it.
